oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Civil action no. 3564, alternate plan of desegregation, 1961 March 27
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Witt, Raymond B., 1915-2000
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Civil action submitted by Mapp v. Board of Education counsel for the defendants, Raymond B. Witt, to establish a second plan for public school integration in Chattanooga, Tennessee after the first plan, submitted in 1960 December, was rejected.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Mapp v. Board of Education of Chattanooga; Segregation in education -- Law and legislation; Segregation in education -- Tennessee -- Chattanooga
